name: n-BUTTONS
description:
A local co-op brawler in the style of Super Smash Bros. When your timer reaches zero, you're out of the game. Stop the clock by controlling a button. You don't have to stay on the button to control it! Last player standing wins.

CONTROLS:

Gamepad required!

Left analog stick: Move

A: Jump

Right Trigger: Dash attack (consumes HP)
